detail_desc: Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Top in textured jersey with a tie detail at the hem and long dolman sleeves with pleats and cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and zipped vents in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Playsuit in a patterned weave with elastication and a frill at the top. Tie-top shoulder straps,  elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Short, A-line skirt in a sturdy, textured weave with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Satin inner skirt.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces in chain- shaped metal with plastic ends, and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Coat in a soft, felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole and buttons down the front. One chest pocket, flap front pockets, two inner pockets, and a single back vent. Twill lining made from recycled polyester. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Short, halterneck top in crocheted cotton with ties that fasten at the back of the neck and an open back with ties at the hem.
Jacket in sequined mesh with long sleeves. No fasteners. Jersey lining.
Knee-length dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, patch front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a deep, wrapover V-neck at the back, short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Knee-length shirt dress in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed trims around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Off-the-shoulder top in spotted mesh with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the sleeves. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, boxy knit with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist with a drawstring, discreet pockets in the side seams and tapered legs.
Skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, frill trim at the top, sewn-on tie belt and side pockets. Unlined.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a text print on the front, decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Lace playsuit with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats below, a concealed zip in one side, and wide legs. Jersey lining.

prod_name: Buzz padded soft bra back det
detail_desc: Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and front fastening.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey top in a relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Knee-length dress in a sturdy, fine knit with a boat neck and cap sleeves. Fitted top, a defined waist with a horizontal panel and a flared skirt with knitted pleats.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and draped front with a wrapover hem.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short raglan sleeves.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping silk jersey with a sheen. Round neckline and visible seams front and back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar, slits in the sides and no buttons.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Straight-cut shirt in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Twill jacket with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and side pockets. Adjustable tabs and buttons at the sides and buttoned cuffs.

Jacket in twill with a slight sheen, collar, and zip and press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with decorative gathers underneath and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Chest pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud and a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with hard-worn details a motif on the front, a rounded hem with slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist. Jersey lining.
Padded Alice band in grained imitation leather lined with velvet. Width 2-4 cm.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with short, puff sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. 3/4-length leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.

V-neck T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a double trim around the neckline and sleeves. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and gently tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a polo neck and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with lapped shoulders and shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details and metal fasteners.

Dress shirt in a cotton weave with a cutaway collar and bib French front with pin-tucks. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly and buttons, side pockets, and straight, wide legs.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with text embroidery on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 2 cm to 8.5 cm.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide elastic waistband. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, a tie belt at the waist and welt side pockets. Lined.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with decorative gathers at the top of the front and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.
